prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek, humanoid design and sharp, blade-like arms.
I want a Pokemon that embodies elegance and strength, featuring a green and blue color scheme.
Generate an image of a Gallade-inspired Pokemon that is agile and protective, standing tall in a forest.
Make a bipedal fighter Pokemon with a noble appearance and unique arm blades ready for battle.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines psychic abilities with a warrior's spirit, showcasing green and white colors.
Design a Gallade-like creature that thrives in mountainous regions, with a striking pose and fierce gaze.
Show me a Pokemon with a graceful stance and a focus on speed and agility in combat.
